GetCount.name: GetCount
GetCount.description: Returns a value that represents the number of objects in the collection.

GetItem.name: GetItem
GetItem.description: Returns a single object from a collection by its ID.

GetParent.name: GetParent
GetParent.description: Returns the parent object for the specified collection.

ApiCharacters#GetCount.name: ApiCharacters#GetCount
ApiCharacters#GetCount.description: Returns a value that represents a number of objects in the collection.

ApiCharacters#GetParent.name: ApiCharacters#GetParent
ApiCharacters#GetParent.description: Returns the parent object of the specified characters.

ApiCharacters#Insert.name: ApiCharacters#Insert
ApiCharacters#Insert.description: Inserts a string replacing the specified characters.

ApiCharacters#SetCaption.name: ApiCharacters#SetCaption
ApiCharacters#SetCaption.description: Sets a string value that represents the text of the specified range of characters.

params.name: Caption
params.description: A string value that represents the text of the specified range of characters.

ApiCharacters#GetCaption.name: ApiCharacters#GetCaption
ApiCharacters#GetCaption.description: Returns a string value that represents the text of the specified range of characters.

ApiCharacters#SetText.name: ApiCharacters#SetText
ApiCharacters#SetText.description: Sets the text for the specified characters.

ApiCharacters#GetText.name: ApiCharacters#GetText
ApiCharacters#GetText.description: Returns the text of the specified range of characters.

ApiCharacters#GetFont.name: ApiCharacters#GetFont
ApiCharacters#GetFont.description: Returns the ApiFont object that represents the font of the specified characters.

ApiFont#GetParent.name: ApiFont#GetParent
ApiFont#GetParent.description: Returns the parent ApiCharacters object of the specified font.

comment:

	 * @property {ApiRange} Parent - Returns the parent object for the specified collection.

properties.name: Count

properties.name: Parent
